billEvents.eventText: referred to consumer affairs and protection

title: Establishes warranties on consumer products
summary: Provides procedure for satisfying warranties on consumer products including repairs, refunds and dispute settlement procedures; provides for suit for breach of warranty with recovery of attorneys' fees by successful consumer and enforcement by attorney general by injunction; excludes certain motor vehicles which are subject to other provisions of law.
actClause: AN ACT to amend the general business law, in relation to warranties on consumer products
